name: Kombo
summary: Kombo – Word Trivia Game is a fun game that lets you play with words and letters. It is a complete learning with fun game which mixes crosswords, anagrams, trivia and word puzzle. You get hints that describe the word. Just guess the correct word and keep learning to keep scoring. The hint also includes the number of letters the word has to help you guess the words and make the right guess. The combination of letters are also provided but with a twist. All the combination are jumbled. You need to join the combination of letters to guess the correct word. Interesting thing is as you keep guessing the words, it becomes even more easier to guess other words that follow.
